data.message: What's innovative about it? I can't see anything that a language like say Perl5 doesn't already provide.

Alright I love this. great effort and awesome job guys (Y) but I read the "why?" section and found features that already exists in other languages like maybe python or ruby.
I'm not saying the language is useless or anything I think we just need some clarification as to why would we use this instead of the existing alternatives.
Once again: good job! :D
Guys, seems like a lot of work was put into this. The guy mentioned that they have been working on it for about two and half years. Shouldn't we be a bit more supportive ?

3-4 years ago i was discussing with the same guy about the same concept .. "WHY", i agree that all the guys in the team acquired a lot of knowledge, otherwise i don't there is a gain.

I can remember that time where we used to learn from Arab team 200 forum , i involved in to many projects of kind "the first Arabian language, OS or whatever" the only return is the knowledge so , we have a better 20+ developer now :)

طبعا مجهود راءع مفيش كلام. بس انا برضه بأيد الكلام السابق ذكرة هنا. Why ?
ايه الى يخلينا نسيب لغتنا الى متعودين عليها و ننقل للغة دى. ايه الى بتوفره زيادة او افضل من الى احنا بنستخدمه حاليا... او حتى لو واحد مبتدء ايه يخليه يسيب اللغات الروعة فى السوق و يختار اللغة دى تحديدا...

عايزين لستة بالامكانيات الجديدة فى اللغة دى...

Mahmoud Samir Fayed
  مؤسس اللغه اهو اذا حد حابب يساله في
 reply here
او كلموه في البوست بتاعه الرئيسي 
وشكرا ليكم جميعا
